card.name: Abundance
card.text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Academy Researchers
card.text: When Academy Researchers enters the battlefield, you may put an Aura card from your hand onto the battlefield attached to Academy Researchers.

card.name: Adarkar Wastes
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Afflict
card.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Aggressive Urge
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Agonizing Memories
card.text: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.

card.name: Ambassador Laquatus
card.text: {3}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Anaba Bodyguard
card.text: First strike

card.name: Ancestor's Chosen
card.text: First strike When Ancestor's Chosen enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.text: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Angelic Chorus
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Arcane Teachings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
card.text: {T}: Draw three cards. {2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Ascendant Evincar
card.text: Flying Other black creatures get +1/+1. Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.

card.name: Assassinate
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Aura Graft
card.text: Gain control of target Aura that's attached to a permanent. Attach it to another permanent it can enchant.

card.name: Aura of Silence
card.text: Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast. Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Avatar of Might
card.text: If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs {6} less to cast. Trample

card.name: Aven Cloudchaser
card.text: Flying When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

card.text: Flying {1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of his or her library.

card.name: Bandage

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Beacon of Destruction
card.text: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.

card.name: Beacon of Immortality
card.text: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.

card.name: Beacon of Unrest
card.text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

card.name: Blaze
card.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

card.text: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Bogardan Firefiend
card.text: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Boomerang
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Bottle Gnomes

card.name: Brushland
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

card.text: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owners' hands.

card.text: {X}: Chimeric Staff becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature until end of turn.

card.text: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Civic Wayfinder
card.text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Clone
card.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Cloud Elemental
card.text: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Cloud Sprite
card.text: Flying Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it.

card.name: Colossus of Sardia
card.text: Trample Colossus of Sardia doesn't untap during your untap step. {9}: Untap Colossus of Sardia. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Commune with Nature
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Composite Golem
card.text: Sacrifice Composite Golem: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Condemn
card.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Cone of Flame
card.text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

card.text: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.

card.name: Samite Healer

card.name: Scalpelexis
card.text: Flying Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top four cards of his or her library. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.

card.name: Scion of the Wild
card.text: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Scoria Wurm
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, return Scoria Wurm to its owner's hand.

card.text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

card.text: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library.
